mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT.ID AS account_id, ACCOUNT.USERNAME, ACCOUNT.PASSWORD, USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM account JOIN user ON account.user_id = user.id JOIN roles ON user.roles_id = roles.id WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (forename, surname, email, roles_id) VALUES (#{forename}, #{surname}, #{email}, #{roles.id})
INSERT INTO account (user_id, username, password) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{username}, #{password})
INSERT INTO roles (developer, scrum_master, product_owner) VALUES (#{developer}, #{scrumMaster}, #{productOwner})
